Lack enough support: The claim that Joe Diffie's death was not due to COVID-19 lacks evidence to support it.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the labeling of Joe Diffie's death as a COVID-19 death was done falsely to obtain funding, without providing any proof.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that official news reports and Joe Diffie's own statement confirmed that he died from complications related to COVID-19.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of false labeling of COVID-19 deaths, suggesting that many deaths attributed to the virus were actually caused by other factors.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that Joe Diffie's death was indeed due to COVID-19, as confirmed by multiple sources.
Understate: The claim understates the seriousness of COVID-19 by implying that it is not a significant cause of death.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on unverified information from an anonymous friend of Joe Diffie's, without corroborating evidence.
